Because of the Spachbund between [Sumerian](Sumerian.html) and [Akkadian](Akkadian.html), see [there](Akkadian).

 According to some data, the Sumerians are associated with the Hurrians and Urartians, and the Caucasus is considered their homeland.[26](https://scientificrussia.ru/articles/shumery-imeli-svjazi-na-kavkaze)[27](https://cdli.ucla.edu/pubs/cdlj/2014/cdlj2014_004.html)[28](https://unesdoc.unesco.org/ark:/48223/pf0000186004), coming via the [Samarra culture](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samarra_culture).  

![susa-egypt.png](susa-egypt.png)  
Near identical building plans of the early Sumerian, [Elamite](Elamite.html) and Egyptian temples, strongly linked iconography and similar [ceremonies](Hieros-gamos) clearly demonstrate that these are not mere trade-artefacts, but in fact proof of a common anchestry of these higher civilizations.

In sumerian the similar-sounding words "life" [til] and "arrow" [ti] were written with the same symbol [ğ’‹¾](ğ’‹¾.html) â‹ [ğ“‹¹](ğ“‹¹.html) @ Horus [ğ“‚š](ğ“‚š)

[ğ’…](ğ’….html) Der Thor, der Sturm, der Ton  

Most important cities:  
Kish northern, semitic since 3000BC(?)  
Nippur center of religion  
Akkad destroyed by [Guti](Guti.html)  
Ur,Uruk,Eridu south harbors  

Lagash&Umma fighting  
[Susa](Susa.html) [Elam](Elam.html)ite partner/adversary  

Some 90% of the hundreds of thousands of tablets found in ancient cities such as Nippur and Girsu remain untranslated.  

Early Sumerian epics indicate an unusually intimate relationship between Sumer and an otherwise unknown land called [Aratta](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aratta).  

[CORPUS](https://etcsl.orinst.ox.ac.uk/cgi-bin/etcsl.cgi?text=all#)
